<font color="#00FF00"> metres away from my house and 
 our community doesn't really exist. </font>

1245.00.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> After the school session, 
 Baz told me how his boxing career </font>

1247.92.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> was cut short in his youth, 
 following a knife attack. </font>

1252.32.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> I'm coming out of a club, </font>

1254.68.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> a man just kind of like surrounded 
 me and pulled this cleaver out. </font><font color="#FFFFFF">Mmm.</font>

1258.48.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> "I want your watch, I want this, 
 that and the other," </font>

1260.68.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> and it was my dad's watch, 
 you know what I mean? </font><font color="#FFFFFF">Yeah. </font>

1263.08.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> And my dad had just passed away 
 from a stroke, so I went, </font>

1265.52.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> "No, you're not having it, so he 
 just went like that with a cleaver. </font>

1268.48.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> It was coming for my head 
 and I put my hands up like this </font>

1271.72.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> and it just went straight 
 through that hand </font>

1274.04.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> and then he went again. </font>

1275.20.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> I went there and straight through my
 hand there, do you know what I mean?</font>

1278.20.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> Mmm. </font><font color="#FFFF00">I'm looking at my hands and my 
 hands are, like, hanging off, man, </font>

1281.72.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> like, there's blood gushing out. </font>

1283.76.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> I thought I could box again 
 but you know, unfortunately, </font>

1287.00.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> every time I was hitting a bag, </font>

1289.36.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> my hands would just swell up 
 again, you know what I mean? </font>

1291.64.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> I was in a dark place, man. </font>

1293.56.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> I had people phoning me up and 
 saying, "You need to deal with this.</font>

1298.68.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> "You've got to make an example of 
 him," and this, that and the other </font>

1302.52.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> and there's a lot of peer pressure 
 going off there and, you know, </font>

1306.04.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> for a young person to have to deal 
 with all that is hard, man. </font>

1309.56.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> And it's easy to make 
 the wrong decision. </font>

1313.44.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> What we've done is we've got 
 satellite boxing clubs like this one</font>

1317.64.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> across areas of deprivation 
 in Nottingham, </font>

1322.76.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> that tend to have, you know, 
 issues with each other... </font><font color="#FFFFFF">Yeah. </font>

1325.44.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> ..Meadows, St Annes, and Radford, 
 you know what I mean? </font>

1327.84.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> Then they can integrate the kids </font>

1330.00.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> from all three clubs through 
 competition. </font>

1332.92.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> By the time they get to an age where
 they could have any kind of </font>

1335.88.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> rivalry or altercation, 
 they're friends. </font><font color="#FFFFFF">Yeah. </font>

1338.36.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> We need to get out there, </font>

1339.60.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> like we were there today 
 and educate these kids around it, </font>

1343.28.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> and stop them carrying knives, man, 
 because they're losing their lives. </font>

1347.92.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> What do we do once these people have
 maybe served their time? </font>

1351.40.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> They might have completely changed 
 whilst they've been inside </font>

1354.52.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> or they might not have. </font>

1356.12.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> The bottom line is when they do come
 out back into society, </font>

1359.36.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> what type of person have we got 
 and then what do we do with them? </font>

1362.84.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> We've got people that might be in 
 gangs who've got a criminal record </font>

1367.52.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> coming out of prison and they need 
 to re-engage in society. </font>

1371.40.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> If we give them support 
 which helps them with CVs, </font>

1374.32.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> volunteering, 
 social skills, life skills, </font>

1377.76.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> we'll help them into employment, 
 training and education. </font>

1381.96.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> What we want to do is give people 
 a route out. </font><font color="#FFFFFF">Mmm. </font>

1387.00.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> Talking to Baz got 
 me thinking about Chris, </font>

1391.32.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> I wanted to meet him again. </font>

1395.28.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> On my way, I heard there had been 
 a double killing </font>

1397.88.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> in another part of the city. </font>

1400.56.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> NEWS REPORT: </font><font color="#FFFF00">
 'Two men, believed to be friends </font>

1403.76.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> 'within 24 hours of one another 
 in Nottingham. </font>

1406.36.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> 'The second man had been 
 hosting a party </font>

1408.44.text: <font color="#FFFF00"> 'in memory of the first victim.' </font>

1410.04.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> It's sad, I mean, seriously sad. </font>

1414.56.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It's literally just happened, 
 brand-new flowers... </font>

1424.08.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I mean, you can see people have been
 obviously having a drink </font>

1428.76.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> to celebrate his life, but... </font>

1433.52.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Some of the notes are just like... </font>

1435.80.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I mean, obviously, they're personal,
 but like... </font>

1438.44.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> when you read them, 
 they're heartbreaking. </font>

1442.44.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> But this is the reality. </font>

1444.56.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> This is real, 
 you know, you can sit there </font>

1446.84.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and you can talk to 
 as many people as you want, </font>

1449.36.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> this is how it all ends up. </font>

1452.84.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It ends up with somebody losing 
 a son, somebody losing a father, </font>

1456.44.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> a friend, you know, family members 
 and, you know, </font>

1460.76.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> there's repercussions as well 
 from things like this. </font>

1464.48.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It creates hate. When you read 
 these, it's like, </font>

1469.80.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> "we love you and we miss you," </font>

1471.80.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> but you can imagine each and every 
 one of these people are feeling... </font>

1475.68.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> hurt and they feel hatred 
 to the person that's done it. </font>

1495.72.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> This tragic incident made me worry 
 about what would happen to Chris </font>

1499.44.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> if he continued his feud 
 with his rival. </font>

1501.68.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I wanted to see 
 if he was ready to change. </font>

1505.16.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> You know, we spoke about the beef 
 that you had with the guy </font>

1511.92.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Have you managed to find him </font>

1513.92.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> or are you still intent 
 on finding this guy? </font>

1525.44.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> You still intend on 
 stabbing him back and hurting him? </font>

1530.08.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> There's got to be another way, </font>

1531.36.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> rather than walking around 
 with knives every single day. </font>

1537.56.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> Are you carrying again, like, 
 today? </font>

1544.96.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> That's completely different 
 to the one I saw last time. </font>

1547.20.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It's got its own special case 
 and everything. </font>

1550.96.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Last time, just seemed like... </font>

1553.36.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> You told me it was out the top 
 drawer of your kitchen. </font>

1558.80.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> That's going to do 
 some serious damage, Chris. </font>

1561.24.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I mean, if you land that 
 in somebody, that's it. </font>

1564.56.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> I mean, that's your life done, </font>

1567.68.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> that's their life done instantly, 
 you know that, don't you? </font>

1578.04.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> Is that what you're saying, 
 still, then, </font>

1580.12.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> about your life - 
 that it's kill or be killed? </font>

1585.48.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> The minute that goes in 
 and comes out, you're dead. </font>

1590.88.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Are you prepared to die? </font>

1596.88.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> But you're... 
 You're prepared to die, though? </font>

1602.28.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I've been standing outside 
 some railings today, </font>

1605.28.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> flowers everywhere, 
 balloons, candles lit, </font>

1608.08.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> people drinking trying to celebrate 
 someone's life, right? </font>

1612.72.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> To me, I think you've got 
 the opportunity </font>

1616.04.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to make a decision before 
 that happens. </font>

1624.56.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I'm wondering what's holding 
 you back </font>

1627.20.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> from just making that 
 changing your life? </font>

1637.00.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I suppose all I can do, 
 I just wish you the best of luck </font>

1640.12.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and hopefully eventually you'll make
 the right decision. </font>

1660.16.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I can't help but think he's going to
 die, it's as simple as that. It's...</font>

1666.00.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> You know what I mean? </font>

1667.20.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> He can't be walking around 
 the street with a knife like that </font>

1669.92.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and if it's not him, 
 it's someone else. </font>

1673.84.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I mean, in this film, you know, 
 I've spoke to bereaved parents, </font>

1678.84.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I've seen flowers and balloons 
 on walls where people have... </font>

1686.64.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> ..I don't know, it angers me 
 when I see him carrying that knife </font>

1691.04.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> because that could be him </font>

1693.08.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> stabbing someone's son, 
 stabbing someone's daughter, </font>

1696.08.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> stabbing a father, 
 just that blatant disregard for life</font>

1699.48.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> pissed me off a bit. </font>

1706.88.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> He's probably one of thousands 
 within the city. </font>

1711.68.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It just shows you the... 
 the task at hand. </font>
